meanings.definition: The practice of obtaining goods or services from an outside supplier
meanings.sent1: Our company's outsourcings of customer service to a call center have improved efficiency.
meanings.sent2: Outsourcings of manufacturing have become common in the industry.
meanings.sent3: The outsourcings of IT support to a tech company saved us a lot of headaches.
meanings.sent4: The outsourcings of catering for the event made it a seamless experience for all attendees.
meanings.sent5: The outsourcings of cleaning services kept our office sparkling clean.

meanings.definition: The act of delegating tasks to an external company
meanings.sent1: The outsourcings of payroll management to a specialized firm reduced our workload.
meanings.sent2: Outsourcings of marketing campaigns can help businesses reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: His outsourcings of grocery shopping to his roommate were always a hit.
meanings.sent4: The outsourcings of event planning to professionals ensured a successful outcome.
meanings.sent5: Outsourcings of website development can save time and resources for a company.

meanings.definition: The process of contracting work to be done by an outside organization
meanings.sent1: The outsourcings of software development to a remote team accelerated our project timeline.
meanings.sent2: Outsourcings of customer surveys provided valuable insights for the business.
meanings.sent3: Her outsourcings of dog walking to the neighborhood kids was a clever solution.
meanings.sent4: The outsourcings of graphic design added a fresh perspective to our branding.
meanings.sent5: Outsourcings of legal services ensured compliance with regulations.
